text.p: 2. Convert the following code into code that uses a for loop.

prints Hello!
prints 10
prints 8
prints 6
prints 4
prints 2

codeparam.answer_display:
# There are always many ways to solve a programming problem. Here is one: print("Hello!") for num in range(0, 10, 2): print(10 - num)
# Here is another: print("Hello!") for num in range(10, 0, -2): print(num)
